basicInfo.name: Colt
basicInfo.flavor: The commander trained Colt in battle combat, but Colt was neglectful of her duties and frequently absent, causing trouble. However, she proved her exceptional skills by defeating monsters in the war, and earned a promotion to an officer position early on.

Normal Attack.desc:
2 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 55% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 70% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Quick n' Easy
Skill 1.desc:
4 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 40% of Physical Attack 2 time(s).
 - Each attack has a 35% chance to inflict Bomb. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 50% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Chance: Bomb chance becomes 45%.

Skill 2.name: Time for a Show
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 125% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 50% chance to inflict Bomb. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - Detonates Bombs at 150% of their power. [Max 3 Bomb(s)]
 - 100% chance to inflict All Attack Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 150% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Effect: All Attack Reduction to 18%.

Passive.name: Wandering Gunslinger
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Camouflage. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Speed-Based Attack Boost. [Always Active]
 - All Allies
 - Grants Effect Hit Rate Boost. [Always Active]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Speed-Based Attack max becomes 1320.
 - Increases Effect: Effect Hit Rate Boost to 34%.
超越2段階達成効果
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: Guts. [Once per Battle]
 - Adds Effect: Barrier equal to 155% of the caster's Physical Attack upon triggering Guts. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
超越6段階達成効果
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: 23s Skill Cooldown Reduction when an enemy falls in battle.

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Fancy and stylish things, freedom, Pallanus, fun things, tasty things
profile.dislikes: Orkah, rules, customs, restraints, plain things, unstylish things, not tasty things
profile.story: The commander trained Colt in battle combat, but Colt was neglectful of her duties and frequently absent, causing trouble. However, she proved her exceptional skills by defeating monsters in the war, and earned a promotion to an officer position early on.

basicInfo.name: Colt
basicInfo.flavor: During the war against monsters, a solider caught Colt at a transaction site, and she faced execution. However, a commander was impressed by her skills and saved her life but forced her to enlist in the military.

profile.story: During the war against monsters, a solider caught Colt at a transaction site, and she faced execution. However, a commander was impressed by her skills and saved her life but forced her to enlist in the military.

basicInfo.name: Colt
basicInfo.flavor: Once a well-known drifter of the back alleys, Colt used to make a living taking on all sorts of shady tasks through the black market. Known for never failing an assassination, she had the nickname \"Alley Hunter.\
